Workflow Refined.title: Modo 15.1 - Workflow Refined
Workflow Refined.description: A summary of the new features in Modo 15.1.

Create Complex 3D Shapes from 2D Curves.title: Modo 15.1 - Create Complex 3D Shapes from 2D Curves with Curve Booleans
Create Complex 3D Shapes from 2D Curves.description: Learn how to create complex 3D models such as logos, decals and more using Modo's curve tools coupled with a system of booleans to create complex 2D shapes that are ready for 3D conversion.
